name: Kurfürst - Downbad Maximum
description:
Completely free to play shoot 'em up game set in a WW2-era Germany. Defend the mainland from the advancing Soviet forces! Survive 5 waves of enemies and face a 1v1 with the final boss.  The game is in a prototype stage at the moment.

Controls: WASD/Arrows to move, spacebar to fire, F to toggle Fullscreen

*note: minor bugs and crashes somewhat likely to occur.
Also, Swastika warning (menu art).
